pages.text: The $(mob)Blaze$() is a monster commonly found in $(thing)Nether Fortresses$(). It floats in the air and attacks players on sight.$(p)Its attacks consists of volleys of 3 fireballs. Fireballs set whatever they hit on fire, be it players or blocks. $(mob)Blazes$() are also immune to fire and take damage from $(thing)Water$() and $(item)Snowballs$().
$(mob)Blazes$() drop $(item)Blaze Rods$() on death. These can be used as $(item)Furnace$() fuel, or broken down into $(item)Blaze Powder$(), an essential material for brewing $(item)Potions$().
